name: Explainability
description: Understanding how AI systems make decisions and what factors influence their outputs.

name: Fairness
description: Ensuring AI systems treat different groups and individuals equitably.

name: Privacy
description: Protecting personal data and maintaining confidentiality in AI systems.

name: Reliability
description: Building AI systems that perform consistently and predictably.

name: Safety
description: Ensuring AI systems operate safely and do not cause harm.

name: Security
description: Protecting AI systems from malicious attacks and unauthorized access.

name: Transparency
description: Making AI systems and their decision-making processes open and understandable.
